definitions.definition: A person or thing that foreshadows or foretells the coming of someone or something.
examples: harbinger of danger; harbinger of doom; harbinger of spring

definitions.definition: One who provides lodgings; especially, the officer of the English royal household who formerly preceded the court when travelling, to provide and prepare lodgings.

main_definition: A person or thing that foreshadows or foretells the coming of someone or something.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) One who provides lodgings; especially, the officer of the English royal household who formerly preceded the court when travelling, to provide and prepare lodgings.
